summary.overview: This JCL performs a complete data extraction from the Card Demo authorization database, converting hierarchical IMS database records into sequential flat files. The process creates separate output files for authorization summary records and detailed authorization records for backup, reporting, or data migration purposes.
business_functions: Delete existing authorization database output files to ensure clean data extraction
Extract authorization summary records from IMS database root segments
Extract authorization detail records from IMS database child segments
Create sequential flat files containing authorization summary data with 100-byte records
Create sequential flat files containing authorization detail data with 206-byte records
Validate account IDs in summary records before processing
Maintain record counters for processing statistics and reporting
Generate backup copies of authorization data in sequential format for analysis and integration

UNLDPADB.JCL.program_overview: Extracts pending authorization data from IMS database hierarchical structure into sequential output files

datasource_summary.name: Pending Authorization Summary Data (PAUTSUM0)
datasource_summary.function: Root segment containing pending authorization summary records retrieved for processing and extraction

datasource_summary.name: Pending Authorization Detail Data (PAUTDTL1)
datasource_summary.function: Child segment containing detailed authorization information associated with each summary record

datasource_summary.name: Authorization Summary Extract File (OPFILE1)
datasource_summary.function: Output file containing extracted pending authorization summary records from IMS database

datasource_summary.name: Authorization Detail Extract File (OPFILE2)
datasource_summary.function: Output file containing extracted pending authorization detail records with associated root segment keys

datasource_summary.name: Payment Authorization Root Data Unload File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PAUTDB.ROOT.FILEO)
datasource_summary.business_name: Payment Authorization Root Data Unload File
datasource_summary.function: Fixed-length output file containing unloaded root database records from payment authorization system

datasource_summary.name: Payment Authorization Child Data Unload File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PAUTDB.CHILD.FILEO)
datasource_summary.business_name: Payment Authorization Child Data Unload File
datasource_summary.function: Fixed-length output file containing unloaded child database records from payment authorization system

datasource_summary.name: Payment Authorization Database (OEM.IMS.IMSP.PAUTHDB)
datasource_summary.function: IMS database containing payment authorization data to be extracted and unloaded for processing

datasource_summary.name: Payment Authorization Database Index (OEM.IMS.IMSP.PAUTHDBX)
datasource_summary.function: IMS database index file providing efficient access to payment authorization data records
